Reviews.Title: Power Plug Adapter
Reviews.Author: H. E. Perez "handyhecx"
Reviews.Content: These are great!. I'm using on the ends of my Siamese cable run. It gives a nice clean custom look. I like that I can use the thicker 18 ga. wire for my cameras.Follow-up:One Note though, After using a new batch I noticed the polarity is reversed. Also had a couple of defective ones that would short my power supply box. Took me some time to figure it out. I would verify with a multimeter before installing. In all I'm still very pleased. All my cameras are working! Knocked one star off!

Reviews.Title: Caution The Positive and Negative Markings Are Wrong
Reviews.Author: C. Boyd
Reviews.Content: I ordered these connectors to use on a CCTV system. The screws were marked with positive and negative markings. On most low voltage devices the center pin is positive. I assumed that the positive was the center pin and hooked up the wiring that way. After completing the wiring I found that the markings were inconsistent. Some were marked with the center pin as positive and others were the other way around. It took me some time to figure out why I was getting voltage on the shield of the coax and the cameras were not working. If you buy these just keep in mind the + and - mean nothing. They worked great after figuring that out. I would buy them again but I would test them before I installed them.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: 440bx
Reviews.Content: These connectors are substantially better than using pigtails.  The connection they make with the female end is adequate but, I wish it were just a tad tighter (which is possible and is the reason why I did not give the product 5 stars.)Securing the cable ends is easy and they are truly secured in the connector.  The connectors are clearly labelled for positive and negative.I've used over a dozen of them so far and each one has worked flawlessly.  Though I do not consider them perfect (4 stars instead of 5), they are worth recommending.

Reviews.Title: Power Plug Adapter completes my wiring
Reviews.Author: Bill the Gadgeteer
Reviews.Content: A power adapter I purchased had an output that you plugged the wire terminal into a jack.  I wanted to have the power lead off the adapter to end in bare wires so I could connect the wires to some electrical equipment I was using in a control scheme.  The power plug adapter 10 pack provide me the exact arrangement I need - mainly set screws beneath which I could affix bare wires, I bought the power plug adapter from Amazon and had no problem in placing the order or receiving shipmentr.

Reviews.Title: Perfect solution
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: Perfect when you have a lot of cameras to install. I wired these into a old PC power supply with a 5 amp 12V rating. Now I have eight cameras and microphones on a single (cheap) reliable power supply. Only one plug into the outlet (no bulky adapters) and I still have room for more cameras. Best of all it looks clean.

Reviews.Title: Easy solution.
Reviews.Author: Seadawg
Reviews.Content: Glad to find these at Amazon.  Had looked at local big box store and Radio Shack and could not find what I needed.  Used these adapters on two paired wires from Cat 5e to carry the power to security cameras.  Plugged directly into the cameras on one end and the power source at the other end, 50 - 60 feet away.  Worked like a charm.

Reviews.Title: Good product, reasonably priced
Reviews.Author: WFC
Reviews.Content: This product was reasonably priced and worked well. Wire connections were easy to make resulting in a quick repair or original connection. Take care in checking for proper polarity.

Reviews.Title: simplified
Reviews.Author: Josh Goode
Reviews.Content: work well with cat 5/6 have had no problems .. over a year after use .  i order these all the time

Reviews.Title: Worked wonderful for my arduino
Reviews.Author: mike sorensen
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my arduino projects and they are awesome they fit the power jack and work wonderfully I have read reviews that said that the center was not positive but the ones that I got were center positive

Reviews.Title: Solves a lot of problems
Reviews.Author: Woodlandsman "Woodlandsman"
Reviews.Content: Make just about any two small wires your camera power wires. Has a "+" and "-" on it to help you keep your sanity. It would get more stars if the + and - were easier to read.

Reviews.Title: Easy work
Reviews.Author: max
Reviews.Content: The little adapters make providing a power supply to a remote area easy. I taped in to 12 volt supply in my van and ran the wire to the rear door to install a back up camera ( which I also bought on Amazon). The connection was a lot simpler with the adapter than soldering. I don't remember the price but I feel they are worth the money. They could not have been to expensive since am on a fixed income.

Reviews.Title: An inexpensave alternative to pre-made fixed length CCTV cables.
Reviews.Author: Gene Thomas "p jocky"
Reviews.Content: An inexpensave alternative to pre-made, fixed length CCTV cables. These are great if you have a lot of two wire conductors laying around.Indoor or outdoor use. Just cover the wire side with electrical tape if you use it outdoors.

Reviews.Title: 2.1mmx5.5mm DC power
Reviews.Author: DM
Reviews.Content: Gives the option to test somthing or use w/o solder or permanent connection - came before the avertised time frame and the price was more than OK would recomend to anyone using this type of DC power connector,

Reviews.Title: Good Quality
Reviews.Author: PAR "PAR"
Reviews.Content: I got the product that I ordered on time. the quality was good and did what I wanted to do. Good Quality

Reviews.Title: Well made - perfect design
Reviews.Author: Richard Dis Assembler "Mr. Tronics"
Reviews.Content: Well made - perfect design - and AFFORDABLE!Require a small Phillips screwdriver to loosen/tighten wire clamps.Hold up to 14 awg at least, but also clamps 22 awg nicely.I should have bought more. Good for quick LED lighting jobs.

Reviews.Title: Work great.
Reviews.Author: B. Harrington
Reviews.Content: I needed to extend the power cord on a tailgate camera. Bought these and it's female counterpart. Add whatever length of 18AWG you need an you have a 12V extension cord. Works great. Be sure to have an 1/8" screwdriver handy since these terminals have pretty small screws.

Reviews.Title: Flawless
Reviews.Author: Johnny
Reviews.Content: most of the time buying connectors you get some that just doesn't fit right or may have a loose end.  So far I hve purchased several packs of these and I have not run into a bad one yet.

Reviews.Title: Labelled correctly
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: There were reviews that the connectors were improperly labeled. I hooked these up to my LED strips and they work great. Negative goes to black, and positive goes to red on my LED lighting.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Curt Stein
Reviews.Content: this is a great little product to replace the original ends for security camera cables.  I'm very satisfied with them.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed.
Reviews.Author: H. Smith
Reviews.Content: Product arrived via air mail from Hong Kong as I recall. It was the first parcel I have ever received directly from China. All pieces intact.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: JackRyan88
Reviews.Content: These were so nice and simple to use for a camera project at our cabin.  The only thing I added was some shrink tubing to make them watertight.

Reviews.Title: Easy connectors
Reviews.Author: Ted Weissgerber
Reviews.Content: Work great without having to solder anything! Proper polarity is marked above the Phillips screw connectors. Normally for 12 volt appliances.

Reviews.Title: Why would I buy these?
Reviews.Author: EK406
Reviews.Content: If you are installing your own video surveillance camera system, this maybe an option you need to include.If you have the perfect application where your cameras are spaced exactly the distance as standard cabling sizes come in, then you may not need these. But most of us, in the real world, will install some cameras not at at the same distance from the DVR. Or we do not want to leave an unsightly cable knot, after all there is the necessary cable slack and then there is unsightly and unprofessional looking cable SLACK.These adapters allow you to cut off the power ends and replace them to the exact length needed or are for use in other applications where you may not be using Siamese RG cabling, such as at the end of a large run terminated into close cameras hanging off of a video balun.In any case, these are neat and easy to use whatever your application.

Reviews.Title: Work ok but check the polarity.
Reviews.Author: gwe
Reviews.Content: They do the job but the center +/- markings are not the same on the male and female parts. Just check before connecting your wires.

Reviews.Title: Male Power Adapters
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: These adapters work great for running power to my cameras through cat5e data cable. They allow you to place cameras in locations where you have no AC outlet nearby. Excellent seller with prompt shipping and reasonable prices!!

Reviews.Title: Good product - great price
Reviews.Author: g.bo
Reviews.Content: I used these adapters outdoors to connect power to security cameras via CAT5e cable at the camera end. Two months of continuous use and no problems! Shipping was the usual quick and efficient AMAZonING way.

Reviews.Title: Finally got these
Reviews.Author: Scott Sutton
Reviews.Content: I got these in the mail finally. I guess the first shipment was lost in the mail and after several email to the seller they shipped another set out to me which I did receive. Needed these for a security camera system install. Plug seem to be exactly what was stated. Everything should work out fine.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.1mm x 5.5mm Male Plug power connector. Connectss to Female Jack on CCTV Camera.
Screw terminal strip for connecting power wires.
For CCTV power cable installation.
Pack of 10 connectors.
ProductInfo.Name: 2.1mm x 5.5mm Male CCTV Power Plug Adapter 10 Pack
